channel.title: VirtualPkers || Hybridding || Master & pure || Spawn || Oldschool. (Beta)
channel.description:
[B]Beta will be hosted until Tuesday, December 4th.[/B]
[URL=http://virtualpkers.com/][B]VirtualPkers - Forums[/B][/URL] [URL=http://virtualpkers.com/play.php][B]VirtualPkers - Play[/B][/URL] [URL=http://virtualpkers.com/client.jar][B]VirtualPkers - Client.jar[/B][/URL]
[B]Features[/B]
[ul][li]Newer f-keys[/li] [li]Custom items (i.e vesta, chaotics, etc.)[/li] [li]Re-written combat[/li] [li]Working chaotics[/li] [li]Pk point shop[/li] [li]Flawless PKing[/li] [li]Many pking zones[/li] [li]Lunar magics working[/li] [li]New text engine[/li] [li]Much more, come line and see![/li][/ul]
[B]Media[/B] [IMG]http://virtualpkers.com/Screenshot_1.png[/img] [IMG]http://virtualpkers.com/Screenshot_2.png[/img] [IMG]http://virtualpkers.com/Screenshot_3.png[/img] [IMG]http://virtualpkers.com/Screenshot_4.png[/img] [IMG]http://virtualpkers.com/Screenshot_5.png[/img] [I]More media shall be added once some players come online.[/I]
See you online. ^^
